text: Tomara yekhane'i thaka na kena mrtyu tomadera nagala pabe'i, emanaki su'ucca sudrrha durge abasthana karale'o [1]. Yadi tadera kono kalyana haya tabe tara bale, ‘eta allahara kacha theke.’ Ara yadi tadera kono akalyana haya tabe tara bale, ‘eta apanara kacha theke’ [2].
